data.message:
My Facebook page that I use has been reported and u guys asked for an ID to be able to confirm its me but I don't know how to do that this Facebook page is only temporary the Facebook page u guys loged me out of has all my friends and I don't know hot to bring it back please help me I really really want my other facebook back it has all my friends on it and my pics  and memory's so please can u help me .
I also lost my email but I have my phone number if that helps ?

replies.message: Hi Ayah. It sounds like we are trying to confirm your identity. You can learn more here: http://on.fb.me/1PH7PF6. We hope this helps provide clarification! -Kristin
It won't work  I've been trying all day can't I just give u my phone number and u bring it back
